title: Enterprises failing to get the most out of their mobile apps: Infographic
text: Share Despite the overall enthusiasm for mobile apps, widespread adoption and use of apps within the enterprise has yet to occur, according to a report released by Accenture.The Accenture Mobility Research states that one possible reason mobile apps aren't more pervasive in the enterprise is that many companies have yet to put in place measures that facilitate successful adoption. However, executives remain convinced of the importance of mobile apps and see their use poised to increase.The study finds that as enterprises continue on their journey toward becoming a digital business, companies should keep in mind the following key guidelines that can enhance the business value that companies' appsas well as their broader mobile initiativescan generate.The infographic below highlights the types of mobile apps currently used, and the key measures required to make most out of mobile apps.To read the report, click here Source: www.accenture.com
